Open Health Works

Hello !

What is an Open Health Works ?

Open Health Works is a not-for-profit company limited by guarantee grown out of the NHS Hack Day community.

Who are Open Health Works ?

Our advisory group are:

  • Anne Marie Cunningham
  • Carl Reynolds
  • David Miller
  • Helen Jackson
  • Jon Hilton
  • Kristian Glass
  • Marcus Baw
